items.sentence: This is the funniest movie I\'ve seen in a long time.
The very thought of eating snails makes me feel sick.
Tom convinced himself he hadn\'t done anything wrong.
Do you expect me to believe you did this on your own?
Do you think I should tell Tom what you just told me?
Do you think Tom will like the gift I bought for him?
You look a lot like someone I used to know in Boston.
You need to take a shower before you go to the party.
You should drink about two liters of water every day.
There were 300 protesters outside the police station.
